import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBCheckbox, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBTabs, MDBTabsItem, MDBTabsLink, MDBTabsContent, MDBTabsPane } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; const Login = () => { const [loginRegisterActive, setLoginRegisterActive] = useState('login'); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const handleLoginRegisterClick = (value) => { setLoginRegisterActive(value); }; const handleLoginSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Fetch the JSON data const response = await fetch('./credentials.json'); const credentials = await response.json(); const user = credentials.find( (user) => user.email === email && user.password === password ); if (user) { alert('Login successful!'); } else { alert('Invalid credentials'); } }; return (
handleLoginRegisterClick('login')} active={loginRegisterActive === 'login'} > Login handleLoginRegisterClick('register')} active={loginRegisterActive === 'register'} > Register

Sign in with:

setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} /> Forgot password? Sign in

); } export default Login;
